pullRequest.title: Refactor and improve request object validation
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR refactors and improves the request object validation logic

nodes.bodyText:
The default implementation of validateClientIdAndResponseType won't send false but throws exceptions.
Since validateClientIdAndResponseType is a protected method, we better honor the response of this method. If it returns false, we have to return false.
